gpt_university_description: The University of Pennsylvania (commonly referred to as Penn) is a private research university located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Founded in 1740 by Benjamin Franklin, it is a member of the Ivy League and is renowned for its strong emphasis on interdisciplinary learning. The university offers a wide range of undergraduate and graduate programs across 12 schools, and is well-known for its prestigious business and law schools.
gpt_location_cost_of_living: The cost of living in Philadelphia is relatively affordable compared to other major US cities. However, it is still higher than the national average. Students can expect to pay for housing, groceries, transportation, and other basic expenses.
gpt_location_weather: Philadelphia experiences a humid subtropical climate marked by hot summers and cold winters. The city experiences four distinct seasons, with temperatures ranging from an average of 32째F (0째C) in January to 87째F (31째C) in July. The city also sees moderate rainfall and occasional snowfall in the winter months.
gpt_location_description: Philadelphia, also known as the City of Brotherly Love, is a vibrant and diverse city, steeped in history and culture. Home to iconic landmarks such as the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall, it offers a rich blend of historical sites, museums, and arts venues. With a lively culinary scene, numerous parks, and friendly locals, Philadelphia is an exciting and dynamic place to live and study.
gpt_location_crime: Philadelphia has a higher crime rate compared to the national average, with property crime being more common than violent crime. However, the city has been working on improving public safety, and crime rates have been decreasing in recent years. Students are advised to take basic safety precautions and remain aware of their surroundings.
gpt_location_transportation: Public transportation in Philadelphia is operated by SEPTA and includes buses, subways, trolleys, and commuter trains. The city is also served by a bike-sharing system called Indego. In addition, taxis and ride-sharing services like Uber and Lyft are readily available.
